prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with black and yellow stripes and sharp wings.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a bee, with a sleek body and a fierce look.
Generate a Pokemon that can fly gracefully with a striking color pattern.
Make a fierce bug-type creature that has a stinger and a powerful presence.
Imagine a speedy insect Pokemon with vibrant colors and distinctive features.
Design a Pokemon that can navigate through forests and grasslands effortlessly.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies agility and has a striking insectoid appearance.
